languages.text: "Когда я гадала на костях и жилах, то видела в их сплетениях твою гордыню. Жажда подвига перевесила бдительность. Ты не давал им в руки оружие, но не защитил его. Ты не изменил сознательно, но слишком жаждал подвига и славы".

"Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."
languages.original_text: "Когда я гадала на костях и жилах, то видела в их сплетениях твою гордыню. Жажда подвига перевесила бдительность. Ты не давал им в руки оружие, но не защитил его. Ты не изменил сознательно, но слишком жаждал подвига и славы".

traits.locale_text: "During my haruspication from bones and sinews, I saw your pride in their tangle. Your thirst for heroism had got the better of your vigilance. You did not hand them the weapons, but you failed to protect it. Yours was not deliberate treason but you desired a hero's glory too much."

"During my haruspication from bones and sinews, I saw your pride in their tangle. Your thirst for heroism had got the better of your vigilance. You did not hand them the weapons, but you failed to protect it. Yours was not deliberate treason but you desired a hero's glory too much."

"Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

"Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

"Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

"Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

languages.text: « Votre orgueil nous a été révélé par les ossements et les tendons. Vous avez abandonné toute vigilance pour une vaine promesse de gloire. Vous n'avez pas donné vous-même les armes aux traîtres, mais vous avez quitté votre poste pour chercher à devenir des héros. Bien que vous n'ayez pas agi avec l'intention de trahir, vous êtes néanmoins complices. »
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: « Votre orgueil nous a été révélé par les ossements et les tendons. Vous avez abandonné toute vigilance pour une vaine promesse de gloire. Vous n'avez pas donné vous-même les armes aux traîtres, mais vous avez quitté votre poste pour chercher à devenir des héros. Bien que vous n'ayez pas agi avec l'intention de trahir, vous êtes néanmoins complices. »

languages.text: «El hueso y el nervio han revelado su arrogancia. Ha abandonado la vigilancia en busca de gloria. No dio armas a los traidores, pero abandonó su puesto con intención de convertirse en héroe. Aunque no tuvo intención de traicionar, sus actos fueron cómplices».
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: «El hueso y el nervio han revelado su arrogancia. Ha abandonado la vigilancia en busca de gloria. No dio armas a los traidores, pero abandonó su puesto con intención de convertirse en héroe. Aunque no tuvo intención de traicionar, sus actos fueron cómplices».

languages.text: “白骨与筋腱早就揭示了你的傲慢，你为了荣耀而放下了警惕。虽然你并没有亲手将武器递给叛徒，但你为了逞英雄，擅自离开了岗位。尽管你并没有叛国的意图，但你依然是他们的同谋。”
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: “白骨与筋腱早就揭示了你的傲慢，你为了荣耀而放下了警惕。虽然你并没有亲手将武器递给叛徒，但你为了逞英雄，擅自离开了岗位。尽管你并没有叛国的意图，但你依然是他们的同谋。”

languages.text: 「骨と筋があなたの傲慢さを明らかにした。あなたは栄光の約束のために警戒を放棄した。裏切り者に武器を与えず、英雄の道を求めて持ち場を離れた。あなたは反逆の意図を持って行動したわけではないが、それにもかかわらず、あなたは加担している」
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: 「骨と筋があなたの傲慢さを明らかにした。あなたは栄光の約束のために警戒を放棄した。裏切り者に武器を与えず、英雄の道を求めて持ち場を離れた。あなたは反逆の意図を持って行動したわけではないが、それにもかかわらず、あなたは加担している」

languages.text: "Knochen und Sehnen haben Eure Hybris offenbart. Ihr habt die Wachsamkeit aufgegeben, um Ruhm nachzujagen. Ihr habt den Verrätern keine Waffen gegeben, doch Ihr habt Euren Posten verlassen, um den Pfad eines Helden zu beschreiten. Es geschah nicht aus verräterischer Absicht, aber Ihr habt Euch dennoch mitschuldig gemacht."
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Knochen und Sehnen haben Eure Hybris offenbart. Ihr habt die Wachsamkeit aufgegeben, um Ruhm nachzujagen. Ihr habt den Verrätern keine Waffen gegeben, doch Ihr habt Euren Posten verlassen, um den Pfad eines Helden zu beschreiten. Es geschah nicht aus verräterischer Absicht, aber Ihr habt Euch dennoch mitschuldig gemacht."

languages.text: "Kemikler ve tendonlar, kibrinizi açığa çıkardı. İhtişam vaatleri uğruna teyakkuzu bir kenara attınız. Hainlere silah vermeseniz bile kahramanın yolundan gitmek için görev yerinden ayrıldınız. Her ne kadar hainlik niyetiyle davranmasanız da suça ortak oldunuz."
languages.original_text: "Bone and sinew revealed your hubris. You abandoned vigilance for the promise of glory. You did not give weapons to the traitors, but you left your post to seek a hero's path. Though you did not act with treasonous intent, you are complicit nonetheless."
